about_the_game:
The past cannot remain hidden forever.

Our main character, who set out one night with a sudden news, had no idea what was in store for him. Alan, who went to a village deep in the forest that seemed abandoned, far from the city, was faced with events he never expected. Everyone in the village died and the village was in ruins. Alan had to first investigate what happened to the village and then move towards his own goal.

In this horror game, we have to collect information about ourselves and face our reality in the semi-cinematic story in which we get lost with its wonderful graphics and gameplay. Will you succeed?

There are things in this game that are not suitable for all ages. For example, frequent blood and savagery. There may also be sudden light changes. And it also includes many phobias. For example, there are phobias such as acluophobia, algophobia, amnesiphobia and more.

content_descriptors.notes: There is violence in this game. But there are elements of fear rather than violence. In terms of violence, there is violence against ourselves as well as against other beings. At the same time, many phobias are also touched upon in the game, apart from violence.
